---
title: "`passgen`"
---

`passgen` is a command-line password generator, written in C++. Currently, the program is in version 0.1.0, and, supports most of the features you normally find in password generators.

# Features

- `passgen` uses only C++ Standard Library. As a result, it is very easy to build;
- It have a option to generate multiple passwords at once;
- Can produce "number-only", or, "special-chars-only" passwords;
